branchCategory.name: Rodless Cylinder, REA, Magnetically Coupled, Sine, Accelerating & Decelaration
branchCategory.description: <p>The REA, Sine Rodless Cylinder - Magnetically Coupled accelerates slowly at beginning stroke and decelerates at end stroke designed for working with delicate materials such as silicone wafers, magnetic disks or LCD substrates yet optimizing throughput with speeds of up to 300 mm/sec. The REA features specially designed U-shaped cushion rings at the cylinder end caps to prevent hard stops. The corresponding sides of the piston head have special cushion packing to faciliate smooth acceleration at the start of stroke. <span style="color: #ff0000;">Please note the REA must be used with an external guide to support the load.</span></p>

breadCrumb.name: Rodless Cylinder - Magnetically Coupled - Sine Wave Motion

branchItem.name: Rodless Cylinder, REA, Sine, Accelerating & Decelarating, Magnetically Coupled - Basic Type
branchItem.description: <p>The REA, Sine Rodless Cylinder - Magnetically Coupled accelerates slowly at beginning stroke and decelerates at end stroke designed for working with delicate materials such as silicone wafers, magnetic disks or LCD substrates yet optimizing throughput with speeds of up to 300 mm/sec. The REA features specially designed U-shaped cushion rings at the cylinder end caps to prevent hard stops. The corresponding sides of the piston head have special cushion packing to faciliate smooth acceleration at the start of stroke.  <span style="color: #ff0000;">Please note the REA must be used with an external guide to support the load.</span></p>

branchItem.name: Rodless Cylinder, REAR, Sine, Accelerating & Decelarating, Magnetically Coupled - Direct Mount
branchItem.description: <p>The REAR, Sine Rodless Cylinder - Magnetically Coupled accelerates slowly at beginning stroke and decelerates at end stroke designed for working with delicate materials such as silicone wafers, magnetic disks or LCD substrates yet optimizing throughput with speeds of up to 300 mm/sec. The REAR features specially designed U-shaped cushion rings at the cylinder end caps to prevent hard stops. The corresponding sides of the piston head have special cushion packing to faciliate smooth acceleration at the start of stroke.  <span style="color: #ff0000;">Please note the REAR must be used with an external guide to support the load.</span></p>

branchItem.name: Rodless Cylinder, REAS, Sine, Accelerating & Decelarating, Magnetically Coupled, Slide Bearing
branchItem.description: <p>The REAS, Sine Rodless Cylinder - Magnetically Coupled accelerates slowly at beginning stroke and decelerates at end stroke designed for working with delicate materials such as silicone wafers, magnetic disks or LCD substrates yet optimizing throughput with speeds of up to 300 mm/sec. The REAS features specially designed U-shaped cushion rings at the cylinder end caps to prevent hard stops. The corresponding sides of the piston head have special cushion packing to faciliate smooth acceleration at the start of stroke. It is a one piece unit integrated with slide bearings which provides lateral stability protecting it from side load impacts.</p>

branchItem.name: Rodless Cylinder, REAL, Sine, Accelerating & Decelarating, Magnetically Coupled - Ball Bushing
branchItem.description: <p>The REAL, Sine Rodless Cylinder - Magnetically Coupled accelerates slowly at beginning stroke and decelerates at end stroke designed for working with delicate materials such as silicone wafers, magnetic disks or LCD substrates yet optimizing throughput with speeds of up to 300 mm/sec. The REAL features specially designed U-shaped cushion rings at the cylinder end caps to prevent hard stops. The corresponding sides of the piston head have special cushion packing to faciliate smooth acceleration at the start of stroke. It is a one piece unit integrated with ball bushing bearings which allows for smooth operation and ensures stable travel resistance.</p>

branchItem.name: Rodless Cylinder, REAH, Sine, Accelerating & Decelarating, Magnetically Coupled - High Precision Guide
branchItem.description: <p>The REAH, Sine Rodless Cylinder - Magnetically Coupled accelerates slowly at beginning stroke and decelerates at end stroke designed for working with delicate materials such as silicone wafers, magnetic disks or LCD substrates yet optimizing throughput with speeds of up to 300 mm/sec. The REAH features specially designed U-shaped cushion rings at the cylinder end caps to prevent hard stops. The corresponding sides of the piston head have special cushion packing to faciliate smooth acceleration at the start of stroke. It is installed with either a single axis or dual axis internal linear guides to support larger load and moment as well as greater precision than the standard REA Series.</p>

branchItem.name: Rodless Cylinder, 12-REA, Sine, Accelerating & Decelarating Clean Room, Magnetically Coupled
branchItem.description: <p>The 12-REA, Sine Rodless Cylinder - Magnetically Coupled accelerates slowly at beginning stroke and decelerates at end stroke designed for working with delicate materials such as silicone wafers, magnetic disks or LCD substrates yet optimizing throughput with speeds of up to 300 mm/sec. The 12-REA features specially designed U-shaped cushion rings at the cylinder end caps to prevent hard stops. The corresponding sides of the piston head have special cushion packing to faciliate smooth acceleration at the start of stroke. It uses fluorine grease making it inert to temperature fluctuations, chemical exposure and various gases which will not cause cracking or swelling in synthetic rubbers or elastomers qualifying it for ISO Class 5 (Class 100) clean room rating.  <span style="color: #ff0000;">Please note the 12-REA must be used with an external guide to support the load.</span></p>
